summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue between East Roy Street and the south end of the bridge across Lake Union in the extension of Sixth Avenue N.E. in the City of Seattle, by paving same with vitrified brick under Ordinance No. 18239, creating Local Improvement District No. 1718 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
